text: hi everyone my name is jerry hargrove
i'm the developer advocate on the amazon
light cell team
and in this short video i'm going to
show you how easy it is
to deploy an e-commerce app on light
cell using lightsail
wordpress and the woocommerce plugin
let's get started
first from the aws management console
let's go to the light cell web console
and here we'll create an instance
first let's choose an instance location
instance location determines where your
light cell instance will be launched
and it can be in any of the supported
aws regions
you can choose an aws region that's
close to you or close to your customers
to reduce latency or you might choose a
region because of data sovereignty or
other regional requirements
i'm going to choose oregon because it's
the close to where i am and i'm the one
that's using this site
next we'll pick an instance image when
you're choosing an image you can choose
a platform whether linux or microsoft
and then an os
or an os and an app for this video i'm
going to choose a linux platform and
we're going to use the wordpress
blueprint we don't need a launch script
for our site and we'll use the default
ssh
key pair to connect to our instance but
i do want to enable automatic snapshots
automatic snapshots provide an easy
mechanism to do daily backups of your
light sale instances
and if there is a problem you can always
restore to the most recent backup or one
over the last seven days
when choosing a light sail instance plan
you should consider the memory
requirements
the cpu requirements storage and data
transfer requirements of your
application
and then choose an instance plan or
bundle that suits those needs
finally i'll provide a name for my
instance
and then create the instance
in a few minutes your light sail
instance will be provisioned and ready
for use
first let's provide a static ip for our
light sail instance
a static ip replaces your instance's
dynamic ip address and persists
after stops and starts or restarts of
your light cell instance
and provides a higher level of
availability
let's connect to our light cell instance
to get the default password for the
wordpress user
here we can see that our wordpress blog
has been provisioned and is running
let's go to the admin page and logged in
so we can start making changes
and from here we'll install the
woocommerce plugin
and install it
and then activate it we can skip store
setup for now
let's choose a simple storefront theme
for our store
we'll install it and then activate it
now let's add some products to our store
for this i'm going to use the sample
products that are provided with the
woocommerce plugin
once the import is done we can view the
products
and we can go back to the website to see
them displayed
and that's it in this video i've shown
you how easy it is to set up an
ecommerce site
using lightsail wordpress and the
woocommerce plugin
you'll need to continue setup and
configure your store details
add your actual products select payment
methods
shipping taxes and other personalization
amazon lifestyle is an easy way to get
started in the cloud you can get started
in minutes and
can benefit from low predictable pricing
you can manage your aws infrastructure
using intuitive global console
or use the api and the command line
interface
additionally it's very easy to scale
your ideas
and grow with light sale and also to
access other aws services
for more information visit the amazon
light cell product page
thank you
you
